TopicTitle: YCG Gaming 40 THINGS TO DO WITH YOUR KERBALS KSP COMEDY VIDEO is out!

Articles.Content:
Hello, this is YCG, I have posted a new comedy video for KSP sometime ago (when the forums were down for maintenance).

This video where I fiddle around with Kerbals and get them to do 40 weird and funny things, like flinging Kerbals off ladders and sliding under each other...

Please watch this video if you want to have some fun!

Video link:

So, if you liked the video please take a look at my other videos at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYVGhtBPL1bWG7V8UyLC93g.

If we get 500 or more views, I will make more content each week!

If we get more than 150 views, I'll make a poll to ask if you want me to make another series, like starting a YouTube series of your choice!

If the video interests you, or you enjoyed it, please leave a like and make a subscription and share this with your friends!

This YouTube channel is different than others, it's more democratic and, not many people make KSP comedy videos, not fast-paced ones, so watch this, especially if you love Danny2462's videos!

I'm going to publish a video this Saturday, it will be fun to watch, as well.

Thanks

YCG Gamer
